              com.googlecode.lanterna.TextCharacter sprite,
              java.lang.String name,
              Maze map)
        The constructor for the weapon collectible.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinate that the weapon collectible is at.
        y - The x-coordinate that the weapon collectible is at.
        power - The amount that this collectible increases attack power by.
        sprite - The char that represents the weapon on the playfield.
        name - The name of the weapon collectible.
        map - The map that this weapon collectible belongs to.
